name: Hipchat Emoticons for all
description: Use hipchat emoticons on other sites

scripts.build-extensions: npm run build-firefox && npm run build-chrome
scripts.build-js: uglifyjs-folder src -eo build && cp src/*.json build/ && rename .min.js .js build/*.min.js
scripts.distribute: cp build/* firefox/data/ && cp build/* chrome/data/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm install && npm run build-js && npm run distribute && npm run build-data-files && npm run build-extensions

author: TheOrangeOne
